thought: To craft a cyan_stained_glass, I need to first craft a cyan_dye, which requires a blue_dye and a green_dye. I can craft a blue_dye from a cornflower, so I will move the cornflower from slot 27 to the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 27 to slot 1 with quantity 1
